articles.author: Michael Sainato
articles.title: Blistering US heatwave spreads from south and scorches 190m Americans - The Guardian US
articles.description: Great Plains, midwest, mid-Atlantic and north-east hit by soaring temperatures, with New York City to reach 102F (39C)
articles.content: A blistering heatwave that has engulfed the southern US over the past four weeks has spread to the Great Plains, midwest, mid-Atlantic and north-eastern regions, placing about 190 million Americans u… [+2002 chars]
